short_summary: request for proposal for air brethging hose
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested at CFSD Montreal by March 15th, 2023.Item 1, GSIN: 4720, NSN: 01-389-2492, HOSE,AIR BREATHINGPart No.: REDAR-A11385-01, NCAGE: 28445Quantity: 50, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to CFSD Montreal.Bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model and/or Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering.The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
